43namespace bm

45
46/*! @name Aggregator traits and control constants
47 @ingroup setalgo
48*/
49//@{
50
51const bool agg_produce_result_bvectors = true;
52const bool agg_disable_result_bvectors = false;
53const bool agg_compute_counts = true;
54const bool agg_disable_counts = false;
55const bool agg_disable_search_masks = false;
56
57/**
58 Aggregation options to control execution
59 Default settings are to support only result bit-vector filters.
60 @ingroup setalgo
61 */
62template <bool OBvects=bm::agg_produce_result_bvectors,
63 bool OCounts=bm::agg_disable_counts,
64 bool OSearchMasks=bm::agg_disable_search_masks>
65struct agg_run_options
66{
67 /// make result(target) vectors (aggregation search results) (Default: true)
68 /// when false is used - means we want to only collect statistics (counts) for the targets
69 static constexpr bool is_make_results() BMNOEXCEPT { return OBvects; }
70
71 /// Compute counts for the target vectors, when set to true, population count is computed for
72 /// each result, results itself can be omitted (make_results flag set to false)
73 static constexpr bool is_compute_counts() BMNOEXCEPT { return OCounts; }
74
75 /// Support for masking operations (Default: false)
76 ///
77 static constexpr bool is_masks() BMNOEXCEPT { return OSearchMasks; }
78};
79
80/**
81 Pre-defined aggregator options to disable both intermediate results and counts
82 @ingroup setalgo
83 */
84typedef
85bm::agg_run_options<agg_disable_result_bvectors, agg_disable_counts>
86agg_opt_disable_bvects_and_counts;
87
88
89/**
90 Pre-defined aggregator options for counts-only (results dropped) operation
91 @ingroup setalgo
92 */
93typedef
94bm::agg_run_options<agg_disable_result_bvectors, agg_compute_counts>
95agg_opt_only_counts;
96
97/**
98 Pre-defined aggregator options for results plus counts operation
99 @ingroup setalgo
100 */
101typedef
102bm::agg_run_options<agg_produce_result_bvectors, agg_compute_counts>
103agg_opt_bvect_and_counts;
104
105//@}
106
107/**
108 Algorithms for fast aggregation of a group of bit-vectors
109
110 Algorithms of this class use cache locality optimizations and efficient
111 on cases, wehen we need to apply the same logical operation (aggregate)
112 more than 2x vectors.
113
114 TARGET = BV1 or BV2 or BV3 or BV4 ...
115
116 Aggregator supports OR, AND and AND-MINUS (AND-SUB) operations
117
118 @ingroup setalgo
119*/
120template<typename BV>
121class aggregator
122{
123public:
124 typedef BV bvector_type;
125 typedef typename BV::size_type size_type;
126 typedef typename BV::allocator_type allocator_type;
127 typedef const bvector_type* bvector_type_const_ptr;
128 typedef bm::id64_t digest_type;
129
130 typedef typename bvector_type::allocator_type::allocator_pool_type allocator_pool_type;
131 typedef
132 bm::heap_vector<bvector_type_const_ptr, allocator_type, true> bv_vector_type;
133 typedef
134 bm::heap_vector<bvector_type*, allocator_type, true> bvect_vector_type;
135 typedef
136 bm::heap_vector<size_t, allocator_type, true> index_vector_type;
137
138
139 /// Codes for aggregation operations which can be pipelined for efficient execution
140 ///
141 enum operation
142 {
143 BM_NOT_DEFINED = 0,
144 BM_SHIFT_R_AND = 1
145 };
146
147 enum operation_status
148 {
149 op_undefined = 0,
150 op_prepared,
151 op_in_progress,
152 op_done
153 };
154
155 /// Aggregator arg groups
156 struct arg_groups
157 {
158 bv_vector_type arg_bv0; ///< arg group 0
159 bv_vector_type arg_bv1; ///< arg group 1
160 index_vector_type arg_idx0; ///< indexes of vectors for arg group 0
161 index_vector_type arg_idx1;
162
163 /// Reset argument groups to zero
164 void reset()
165 {
166 arg_bv0.resize(0); // TODO: use reset not resize(0)
167 arg_bv1.resize(0);
168 arg_idx0.resize(0);
169 arg_idx1.resize(0);
170 }
171
172 /** Add bit-vector pointer to its aggregation group
173 \param bv - input bit-vector pointer to attach
174 \param agr_group - input argument group index (0 - default, 1 - fused op)
175
176 @return current arg group size (0 if vector was not added (empty))
177 */
178 size_t add(const bvector_type* bv, unsigned agr_group);
179 };
180
181 typedef arg_groups* arg_groups_type_ptr;
182 typedef
183 bm::heap_vector<arg_groups_type_ptr, allocator_type, true> arg_vector_type;
184 typedef
185 bm::heap_vector<unsigned, allocator_type, true> count_vector_type;
186 typedef
187 bm::heap_vector<size_type, allocator_type, true> bv_count_vector_type;
188 typedef
189 bm::heap_vector<bm::word_t*, allocator_type, true> blockptr_vector_type;
190 typedef
191 bm::heap_vector<bm::pair<unsigned, unsigned>, allocator_type, true> block_ij_vector_type;
192
193 /**
194 Block cache for pipeline execution
195 @internal
196 */
197 struct pipeline_bcache
198 {
199 bv_vector_type bv_inp_vect_; ///< all input vectors from all groups
200 count_vector_type cnt_vect_; ///< usage count for bv_inp (all groups)
201 blockptr_vector_type blk_vect_; ///< cached block ptrs for bv_inp_vect_
202 block_ij_vector_type blk_ij_vect_; ///< current block coords
203 };
204
205 /**
206 Aggregation options for runtime control
207 */
208 struct run_options
209 {
210 /// Batch size sets number of argument groups processed at a time
211 /// Default: 0 means this parameter will be determined automatically
212 size_t batch_size = 0;
213 };
214
215 /**
216 Pipeline vector for running a group of aggregation operations on a family of vectors.
217 Pipeline is used to run multiple aggregation combinations (searches) for essencially same
218 set of vectors (different combinations of ANDs and SUBs for example).
219 Pipeline execution improves CPU cache reuse and caches the compressed blocks to re-use it
220 for more efficient execution. Essencially it is a tool to run thousads of runs at once faster.
221 */
222 template<class Opt = bm::agg_run_options<> >
223 class pipeline
224 {
225 public:
226 typedef Opt options_type;
227 public:
228 pipeline() {}
229 ~pipeline() BMNOEXCEPT;
230
231 /// Set pipeline run options
232 run_options& options() BMNOEXCEPT { return options_; }
233
234 /// Get pipeline run options
235 const run_options& get_options() const BMNOEXCEPT { return options_; }
236
237
238 // ------------------------------------------------------------------
239 /*! @name pipeline argument groups fill-in methods */
240 //@{
241
242 /** Add new arguments group
243 */
244 arg_groups* add();
245
246 /**
247 Attach OR (aggregator vector).
248 Pipeline results all will be OR-ed (UNION) into the OR target vector
249 @param bv_or - OR target vector
250 */
251 void set_or_target(bvector_type* bv_or) BMNOEXCEPT
252 { bv_or_target_ = bv_or; }
253
254 /**
255 Set search limit for results. Requires that bit-counting to be enabled in the template parameters.
256 Warning: search limit is approximate (for performance reasons) so it can occasinally find more
257 than requested. It cannot find less.
258 @param limit - search limit (target population count to search for)
259 */
260 void set_search_count_limit(size_type limit) BMNOEXCEPT
261 { search_count_limit_ = limit; }
262
263 /** Prepare pipeline for the execution (resize and init internal structures)
264 Once complete, you cannot add() to it.
265 */
266 void complete();
267
268 /** return true if pipeline is ready for execution (complete) */
269 bool is_complete() const BMNOEXCEPT { return is_complete_; }
270
271 /**Return size() of pileine */
272 size_type size() const BMNOEXCEPT { return arg_vect_.size(); }
273
274 //@}
275
276 // ------------------------------------------------------------------
277
278 /** Return argument vector used for pipeline execution */
279 const arg_vector_type& get_args_vector() const BMNOEXCEPT
280 { return arg_vect_; }
281
282 /** Return results vector used for pipeline execution */
283 bvect_vector_type& get_bv_res_vector() BMNOEXCEPT
284 { return bv_res_vect_; }
285
286 /** Return results vector count used for pipeline execution */
287 bv_count_vector_type& get_bv_count_vector() BMNOEXCEPT
288 { return count_res_vect_; }
289
290
291 // ------------------------------------------------------------------
292 /*! @name access to internals */
293 //@{
294
295 const bv_vector_type& get_all_input_vect() const BMNOEXCEPT
296 { return bcache_.bv_inp_vect_; }
297 const count_vector_type& get_all_input_cnt_vect() const BMNOEXCEPT
298 { return bcache_.cnt_vect_; }
299
300 /// Return number of unique vectors in the pipeline (after complete())
301 size_t unique_vectors() const BMNOEXCEPT
302 { return bcache_.bv_inp_vect_.size(); }
303
304 /// Function looks at the pipeline to apply euristics to suggest optimal run_batch parameter
305 size_t compute_run_batch() const BMNOEXCEPT;
306 //@}
307
308 protected:
309 /** @internal */
310 pipeline_bcache& get_bcache() BMNOEXCEPT
311 { return bcache_; }
312 /** Return number of top blocks after complete
313 @internal
314 */
315 unsigned get_top_blocks() const BMNOEXCEPT { return top_blocks_; }
316
317 private:
318 void complete_arg_group(arg_groups* ag);
319 void complete_arg_sub_group(index_vector_type& idx_vect,
320 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src, size_t size);
321
322 protected:
323 friend class aggregator;
324
325 pipeline(const pipeline&) = delete;
326 pipeline& operator=(const pipeline&) = delete;
327
328 protected:
329 run_options options_; ///< execution parameters
330 bool is_complete_ = false; ///< ready to run state flag
331 size_t total_vect_= 0; ///< total number of vector mentions in all groups
332 arg_vector_type arg_vect_; ///< input arg. groups
333
334 bvect_vector_type bv_res_vect_; ///< results (bit-vector ptrs)
335 bv_count_vector_type count_res_vect_; ///< results (counts)
336 size_type search_count_limit_{bm::id_max}; ///< search limit by count
337
338 pipeline_bcache bcache_; ///< blocks cache structure
339 unsigned top_blocks_ = 1; ///< top-level structure size, max of all bvectors
340 bvector_type* bv_or_target_ = 0; ///< OR target bit-bector ptr
341 };
342
343public:
344
345 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
346 /*! @name Construction and setup */
347 //@{
348 aggregator();
349 ~aggregator();
350
351 /**
352 \brief set on-the-fly bit-block compression
353 By default aggregator does not try to optimize result, but in some cases
354 it can be quite a lot faster than calling bvector<>::optimize() later
355 (because block data sits in CPU cache).
356
357 \param opt - optimization mode (full compression by default)
358 */
359 void set_optimization(
360 typename bvector_type::optmode opt = bvector_type::opt_compress) BMNOEXCEPT
361 { opt_mode_ = opt; }
362
363 void set_compute_count(bool count_mode) BMNOEXCEPT
364 { compute_count_ = count_mode; count_ = 0; }
365
366 //@}
367
368
369 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
370
371 /*! @name Methods to setup argument groups and run operations on groups */
372 //@{
373
374 /**
375 Attach source bit-vector to a argument group (0 or 1).
376 Arg group 1 used for fused operations like (AND-SUB)
377 \param bv - input bit-vector pointer to attach
378 \param agr_group - input argument group (0 - default, 1 - fused op)
379
380 @return current arg group size (0 if vector was not added (empty))
381 @sa reset
382 */
383 size_t add(const bvector_type* bv, unsigned agr_group = 0);
384
385 /**
386 Reset aggregate groups, forget all attached vectors
387 */
388 void reset();
389
390 /**
391 Aggregate added group of vectors using logical OR
392 Operation does NOT perform an explicit reset of arg group(s)
393
394 \param bv_target - target vector (input is arg group 0)
395
396 @sa add, reset
397 */
398 void combine_or(bvector_type& bv_target);
399
400 /**
401 Aggregate added group of vectors using logical AND
402 Operation does NOT perform an explicit reset of arg group(s)
403
404 \param bv_target - target vector (input is arg group 0)
405
406 @sa add, reset
407 */
408 void combine_and(bvector_type& bv_target);
409
410 /**
411 Aggregate added group of vectors using fused logical AND-SUB
412 Operation does NOT perform an explicit reset of arg group(s)
413
414 \param bv_target - target vector (input is arg group 0(AND), 1(SUB) )
415
416 \return true if anything was found
417
418 @sa add, reset
419 */
420 bool combine_and_sub(bvector_type& bv_target);
421
422 /**
423 Run AND-SUB: AND (groups1) AND NOT ( OR(group0)) for a pipeline
424 @param pipe - pipeline to run (should be prepared, filled and complete
425 */
426 template<class TPipe>
427 void combine_and_sub(TPipe& pipe);
428
429
430
431 /**
432 Aggregate added group of vectors using fused logical AND-SUB
433 Operation does NOT perform an explicit reset of arg group(s)
434 Operation can terminate early if anything was found.
435
436 \param bv_target - target vector (input is arg group 0(AND), 1(SUB) )
437 \param any - if true, search result will terminate of first found result
438
439 \return true if anything was found
440
441 @sa add, reset, find_first_and_sub
442 */
443 bool combine_and_sub(bvector_type& bv_target, bool any);
444
445 /**
446 Aggregate added group of vectors using fused logical AND-SUB,
447 find the first match
448
449 \param idx - [out] index of the first occurence
450 \return true if anything was found
451 @sa combine_and_sub
452 */
453 bool find_first_and_sub(size_type& idx);
454
455
456 /**
457 Aggregate added group of vectors using SHIFT-RIGHT and logical AND
458 Operation does NOT perform an explicit reset of arg group(s)
459
460 \param bv_target - target vector (input is arg group 0)
461
462 @return bool if anything was found
463
464 @sa add, reset
465 */
466 void combine_shift_right_and(bvector_type& bv_target);
467
468 /**
469 Set search hint for the range, where results needs to be searched
470 (experimental for internal use).
471 @internal
472 */
473 void set_range_hint(size_type from, size_type to) BMNOEXCEPT;
474
475 /**
476 Reset range hint to false
477 */
478 void reset_range_hint() BMNOEXCEPT;
479
480 size_type count() const { return count_; }
481
482 //@}
483
484 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
485
486 /*! @name Logical operations (C-style interface) */
487 //@{
488
489 /**
490 Aggregate group of vectors using logical OR
491 \param bv_target - target vector
492 \param bv_src - array of pointers on bit-vector aggregate arguments
493 \param src_size - size of bv_src (how many vectors to aggregate)
494 */
495 void combine_or(bvector_type& bv_target,
496 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src, size_t src_size);
497
498 /**
499 Aggregate group of vectors using logical AND
500 \param bv_target - target vector
501 \param bv_src - array of pointers on bit-vector aggregate arguments
502 \param src_size - size of bv_src (how many vectors to aggregate)
503 */
504 void combine_and(bvector_type& bv_target,
505 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src, size_t src_size);
506
507 /**
508 Fusion aggregate group of vectors using logical AND MINUS another set
509
510 \param bv_target - target vector
511 \param bv_src_and - array of pointers on bit-vectors for AND
512 \param src_and_size - size of AND group
513 \param bv_src_sub - array of pointers on bit-vectors for SUBstract
514 \param src_sub_size - size of SUB group
515 \param any - flag if caller needs any results asap (incomplete results)
516
517 \return true when found
518 */
519 bool combine_and_sub(bvector_type& bv_target,
520 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and, size_t src_and_size,
521 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_sub, size_t src_sub_size,
522 bool any);
523
524 bool find_first_and_sub(size_type& idx,
525 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and, size_t src_and_size,
526 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_sub, size_t src_sub_size);
527
528 /**
529 Fusion aggregate group of vectors using SHIFT right with AND
530
531 \param bv_target - target vector
532 \param bv_src_and - array of pointers on bit-vectors for AND masking
533 \param src_and_size - size of AND group
534 \param any - flag if caller needs any results asap (incomplete results)
535
536 \return true when found
537 */
538 bool combine_shift_right_and(bvector_type& bv_target,
539 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and, size_t src_and_size,
540 bool any);
541
542
543 //@}
544
545 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
546
547 /*! @name Horizontal Logical operations used for tests (C-style interface) */
548 //@{
549
550 /**
551 Horizontal OR aggregation (potentially slower) method.
552 \param bv_target - target vector
553 \param bv_src - array of pointers on bit-vector aggregate arguments
554 \param src_size - size of bv_src (how many vectors to aggregate)
555 */
556 void combine_or_horizontal(bvector_type& bv_target,
557 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
558 size_t src_size);
559 /**
560 Horizontal AND aggregation (potentially slower) method.
561 \param bv_target - target vector
562 \param bv_src - array of pointers on bit-vector aggregate arguments
563 \param src_size - size of bv_src (how many vectors to aggregate)
564 */
565 void combine_and_horizontal(bvector_type& bv_target,
566 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
567 size_t src_size);
568
569 /**
570 Horizontal AND-SUB aggregation (potentially slower) method.
571 \param bv_target - target vector
572 \param bv_src_and - array of pointers on bit-vector to AND aggregate
573 \param src_and_size - size of bv_src_and
574 \param bv_src_sub - array of pointers on bit-vector to SUB aggregate
575 \param src_sub_size - size of bv_src_sub
576 */
577 void combine_and_sub_horizontal(bvector_type& bv_target,
578 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and,
579 size_t src_and_size,
580 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_sub,
581 size_t src_sub_size);
582
583 //@}
584
585
586 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
587
588 /*! @name Pipeline operations */
589 //@{
590
591 /** Get current operation code */
592 int get_operation() const BMNOEXCEPT { return operation_; }
593
594 /** Set operation code for the aggregator */
595 void set_operation(int op_code) BMNOEXCEPT { operation_ = op_code; }
596
597 /**
598 Prepare operation, create internal resources, analyse dependencies.
599 Prerequisites are: that operation is set and all argument vectors are added
600 */
601 void stage(bm::word_t* temp_block);
602
603 /**
604 Run a step of current arrgegation operation
605 */
606 operation_status run_step(unsigned i, unsigned j);
607
608 operation_status get_operation_status() const { return operation_status_; }
609
610 const bvector_type* get_target() const BMNOEXCEPT { return bv_target_; }
611
612 bm::word_t* get_temp_block() BMNOEXCEPT { return tb_ar_->tb1; }
613
614 //@}
615
616 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
617
618 /*! @name Execition metrics and telemetry */
619 //@{
620 bm::id64_t get_cache_gap_hits() const BMNOEXCEPT { return gap_cache_cnt_; }
621 //@}
622
623protected:
624 typedef typename bvector_type::blocks_manager_type blocks_manager_type;
625 typedef typename BV::block_idx_type block_idx_type;
626 typedef
627 bm::heap_vector<const bm::word_t*, allocator_type, true> block_ptr_vector_type;
628 typedef
629 bm::heap_vector<const bm::gap_word_t*, allocator_type, true> gap_block_ptr_vector_type;
630 typedef
631 bm::heap_vector<unsigned char, allocator_type, true> uchar_vector_type;
632
633
634 void reset_vars();
635
636
637 void combine_or(unsigned i, unsigned j,
638 bvector_type& bv_target,
639 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src, size_t src_size);
640
641 void combine_and(unsigned i, unsigned j,
642 bvector_type& bv_target,
643 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src, size_t src_size);
644
645 digest_type combine_and_sub(unsigned i, unsigned j,
646 const size_t* and_idx,
647 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and, size_t src_and_size,
648 const size_t* sub_idx,
649 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_sub, size_t src_sub_size,
650 int* is_result_full);
651
652 void prepare_shift_right_and(bvector_type& bv_target,
653 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
654 size_t src_size);
655
656 bool combine_shift_right_and(unsigned i, unsigned j,
657 bvector_type& bv_target,
658 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
659 size_t src_size);
660
661 static
662 unsigned resize_target(bvector_type& bv_target,
663 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
664 size_t src_size,
665 bool init_clear = true);
666
667 static
668 unsigned max_top_blocks(const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
669 size_t src_size) BMNOEXCEPT;
670
671
672
673 /// Temporary operations vectors
674 struct arena
675 {
676 block_ptr_vector_type v_arg_tmp_blk; ///< source blocks list
677 block_ptr_vector_type v_arg_or_blk; ///< source blocks list (OR)
678 gap_block_ptr_vector_type v_arg_or_blk_gap; ///< source GAP blocks list (OR)
679 block_ptr_vector_type v_arg_and_blk; ///< source blocks list (AND)
680 gap_block_ptr_vector_type v_arg_and_blk_gap; ///< source GAP blocks list (AND)
681 uchar_vector_type carry_overs; ///< shift carry over flags
682
683
684 void reset_all_blocks()
685 {
686 reset_or_blocks();
687 reset_and_blocks();
688 carry_overs.reset();
689 }
690 void reset_and_blocks()
691 {
692 v_arg_and_blk.reset();
693 v_arg_and_blk_gap.reset();
694 }
695 void reset_or_blocks()
696 {
697 v_arg_or_blk.reset();
698 v_arg_or_blk_gap.reset();
699 }
700
701 };
702
703
704 bm::word_t* sort_input_blocks_or(const size_t* src_idx,
705 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
706 size_t src_size,
707 unsigned i, unsigned j);
708
709 bm::word_t* sort_input_blocks_and(const size_t* src_idx,
710 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
711 size_t src_size,
712 unsigned i, unsigned j);
713 bm::word_t* cache_gap_block(const bm::word_t* arg_blk,
714 const size_t* src_idx,
715 size_t k,
716 unsigned i, unsigned j);
717
718
719 bool process_bit_blocks_or(blocks_manager_type& bman_target,
720 unsigned i, unsigned j, const arena& ar);
721
722 void process_gap_blocks_or(const arena& ar/*size_t block_count*/);
723
724 digest_type process_bit_blocks_and(const arena& ar, /*size_t block_count,*/ digest_type digest);
725
726 digest_type process_gap_blocks_and(const arena& ar, /*size_t block_count,*/ digest_type digest);
727
728 bool test_gap_blocks_and(size_t block_count, unsigned bit_idx);
729 bool test_gap_blocks_sub(size_t block_count, unsigned bit_idx);
730
731 digest_type process_bit_blocks_sub(const arena& ar, /*size_t block_count,*/ digest_type digest);
732
733 digest_type process_gap_blocks_sub(const arena& ar,/*size_t block_count,*/ digest_type digest);
734
735 static
736 unsigned find_effective_sub_block_size(unsigned i,
737 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
738 size_t src_size,
739 bool top_null_as_zero) BMNOEXCEPT;
740
741 static
742 unsigned find_effective_sub_block_size(unsigned i,
743 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src1,
744 size_t src_size1,
745 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src2,
746 size_t src_size2) BMNOEXCEPT;
747
748 static
749 bool any_carry_overs(const unsigned char* carry_overs,
750 size_t co_size) BMNOEXCEPT;
751
752 /**
753 @return carry over
754 */
755 static
756 unsigned process_shift_right_and(bm::word_t* BMRESTRICT blk,
757 const bm::word_t* BMRESTRICT arg_blk,
758 digest_type& BMRESTRICT digest,
759 unsigned carry_over) BMNOEXCEPT;
760
761 static
762 const bm::word_t* get_arg_block(const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
763 unsigned k, unsigned i, unsigned j) BMNOEXCEPT;
764
765 bvector_type* check_create_target();
766
767 // ---------------------------------------------------------
768
769 static arena* construct_arena()
770 {
771 void* p = bm::aligned_new_malloc(sizeof(arena));
772 return new(p) arena();
773 }
774 static void free_arena(arena* ar) BMNOEXCEPT
775 {
776 if (!ar) return;
777 ar->~arena();
778 bm::aligned_free(ar);
779 }
780
781 static arg_groups* construct_arg_group()
782 {
783 void* p = bm::aligned_new_malloc(sizeof(arg_groups));
784 return new(p) arg_groups();
785 }
786
787 static void free_arg_group(arg_groups* arg)
788 {
789 if (!arg) return;
790 arg->~arg_groups();
791 bm::aligned_free(arg);
792 }
793
794 // ---------------------------------------------------------
795
796private:
797 /// Alllocated blocka of scratch memory
798 struct tb_arena
799 {
800 BM_DECLARE_TEMP_BLOCK(tb1)
801 BM_DECLARE_TEMP_BLOCK(tb_opt) ///< temp block for results optimization
802 };
803
804
805 aggregator(const aggregator&) = delete;
806 aggregator& operator=(const aggregator&) = delete;
807
808private:
809 arg_groups ag_; ///< aggregator argument groups
810 tb_arena* tb_ar_; ///< data arena ptr (heap allocated)
811 arena* ar_; ///< data arena ptr
812 allocator_pool_type pool_; ///< pool for operations with cyclic mem.use
813
814 bm::word_t* temp_blk_= 0; ///< external temp block ptr
815 int operation_ = 0; ///< operation code (default: not defined)
816 operation_status operation_status_ = op_undefined;
817 bvector_type* bv_target_ = 0; ///< target bit-vector
818 unsigned top_block_size_ = 0; ///< operation top block (i) size
819 pipeline_bcache* bcache_ptr_ = 0; /// pipeline blocks cache ptr
820
821 // search range setting (hint) [from, to]
822 bool range_set_ = false; ///< range flag
823 size_type range_from_ = bm::id_max; ///< search from
824 size_type range_to_ = bm::id_max; ///< search to
825
826 typename bvector_type::optmode opt_mode_; ///< perform search result optimization
827 bool compute_count_; ///< compute search result count
828 size_type count_; ///< search result count
829 //
830 // execution telemetry and metrics
831 bm::id64_t gap_cache_cnt_ = 0;
832};
833
834
835
836
837// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
838//
839// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
840
841/**
842 Experimental method ro run multiple aggregators in sync
843
844 Pipeleine algorithm walts the sequence of iterators (pointers on aggregators)
845 and run them all via aggregator<>::run_step() method
846
847 @param first - iterator (pointer on aggregator)
848 @param last - iterator (pointer on aggregator)
849 @ingroup setalgo
850*/
851template<typename Agg, typename It>
852void aggregator_pipeline_execute(It first, It last)
853{
854 bm::word_t* tb = (*first)->get_temp_block();
855
856 int pipeline_size = 0;
857 for (It it = first; it != last; ++it, ++pipeline_size)
858 {
859 Agg& agg = *(*it);
860 agg.stage(tb);
861 }
862 for (unsigned i = 0; i < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++i)
863 {
864 unsigned j = 0;
865 do
866 {
867 // run all aggregators for the [i,j] coordinate
868 unsigned w = 0;
869 for (It it = first; it != last; ++it, ++w)
870 {
871 Agg& agg = *(*it);
872 auto op_st = agg.get_operation_status();
873 if (op_st != Agg::op_done)
874 {
875 op_st = agg.run_step(i, j);
876 pipeline_size -= (op_st == Agg::op_done);
877 }
878 } // for it
879 if (pipeline_size <= 0)
880 return;
881
882 } while (++j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
883
884 } // for i
885}
886
887
888// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
889//
890// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
891
892
893template<typename BV>
894aggregator<BV>::aggregator()
895: opt_mode_(bvector_type::opt_none),
896 compute_count_(false),
897 count_(0)
898{
899 tb_ar_ = (tb_arena*) bm::aligned_new_malloc(sizeof(tb_arena));
900 ar_ = construct_arena();
901}
902
903// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
904
905template<typename BV>
906aggregator<BV>::~aggregator()
907{
908 BM_ASSERT(ar_ && tb_ar_);
909 bm::aligned_free(tb_ar_);
910
911 free_arena(ar_);
912
913 delete bv_target_;
914}
915
916// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
917
918template<typename BV>
919void aggregator<BV>::reset()
920{
921 reset_vars();
922 reset_range_hint();
923}
924
925// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
926
927template<typename BV>
928void aggregator<BV>::reset_vars()
929{
930 ag_.reset();
931 ar_->reset_all_blocks();
932 operation_ = top_block_size_ = 0;
933 operation_status_ = op_undefined;
934 count_ = 0; bcache_ptr_ = 0; gap_cache_cnt_ = 0;
935}
936
937// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
938
939template<typename BV>
940void aggregator<BV>::reset_range_hint() BMNOEXCEPT
941{
942 range_set_ = false;
943 range_from_ = range_to_ = bm::id_max;
944}
945
946
947// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
948
949template<typename BV>
950void aggregator<BV>::set_range_hint(size_type from, size_type to) BMNOEXCEPT
951{
952 range_from_ = from; range_to_ = to;
953 range_set_ = true;
954}
955
956// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
957
958template<typename BV>
959typename aggregator<BV>::bvector_type*
960aggregator<BV>::check_create_target()
961{
962 if (!bv_target_)
963 {
964 bv_target_ = new bvector_type(); //TODO: get rid of "new"
965 bv_target_->init();
966 }
967 return bv_target_;
968}
969
970// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
971
972template<typename BV>
973size_t aggregator<BV>::add(const bvector_type* bv, unsigned agr_group)
974{
975 return ag_.add(bv, agr_group);
976}
977
978// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
979
980template<typename BV>
981void aggregator<BV>::combine_or(bvector_type& bv_target)
982{
983 BM_ASSERT(!bv_target.is_ro()); // immutable vector used as a target
984 combine_or(bv_target, ag_.arg_bv0.data(), ag_.arg_bv0.size());
985}
986
987// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
988
989template<typename BV>
990void aggregator<BV>::combine_and(bvector_type& bv_target)
991{
992 BM_ASSERT(!bv_target.is_ro()); // immutable vector used as a target
993 //combine_and(bv_target, ag_.arg_bv0.data(), ag_.arg_bv0.size());
994 // implemented ad AND-SUB (with an empty MINUS set)
995 combine_and_sub(bv_target,
996 ag_.arg_bv0.data(), ag_.arg_bv0.size(),
997 0, 0,
998 false);
999}
1000
1001// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1002
1003template<typename BV>
1004bool aggregator<BV>::combine_and_sub(bvector_type& bv_target)
1005{
1006 BM_ASSERT(!bv_target.is_ro()); // immutable vector used as a target
1007 return combine_and_sub(bv_target,
1008 ag_.arg_bv0.data(), ag_.arg_bv0.size(),
1009 ag_.arg_bv1.data(), ag_.arg_bv1.size(),
1010 false);
1011}
1012
1013// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1014
1015template<typename BV>
1016bool aggregator<BV>::combine_and_sub(bvector_type& bv_target, bool any)
1017{
1018 BM_ASSERT(!bv_target.is_ro()); // immutable vector used as a target
1019 return combine_and_sub(bv_target,
1020 ag_.arg_bv0.data(), ag_.arg_bv0.size(),
1021 ag_.arg_bv1.data(), ag_.arg_bv1.size(),
1022 any);
1023}
1024
1025// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1026
1027template<typename BV>
1028bool aggregator<BV>::find_first_and_sub(size_type& idx)
1029{
1030 return find_first_and_sub(idx,
1031 ag_.arg_bv0.data(), ag_.arg_bv0.size(), //arg_group0_size,
1032 ag_.arg_bv1.data(), ag_.arg_bv1.size());//arg_group1_size);
1033}
1034
1035// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1036
1037template<typename BV>
1038void aggregator<BV>::combine_shift_right_and(bvector_type& bv_target)
1039{
1040 BM_ASSERT(!bv_target.is_ro()); // immutable vector used as a target
1041 count_ = 0;
1042 ar_->reset_all_blocks();
1043 combine_shift_right_and(bv_target, ag_.arg_bv0.data(), ag_.arg_bv0.size(),//arg_group0_size,
1044 false);
1045}
1046
1047// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1048
1049template<typename BV>
1050void aggregator<BV>::combine_or(bvector_type& bv_target,
1051 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src, size_t src_size)
1052{
1053 BM_ASSERT(!bv_target.is_ro()); // immutable vector used as a target
1054 if (!src_size)
1055 {
1056 bv_target.clear();
1057 return;
1058 }
1059 ag_.reset();
1060 ar_->reset_or_blocks();
1061 unsigned top_blocks = resize_target(bv_target, bv_src, src_size);
1062 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
1063 {
1064 unsigned set_array_max =
1065 find_effective_sub_block_size(i, bv_src, src_size, false);
1066 for (unsigned j = 0; j < set_array_max; ++j)
1067 {
1068 combine_or(i, j, bv_target, bv_src, src_size);
1069 } // for j
1070 } // for i
1071}
1072
1073// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1074
1075template<typename BV>
1076void aggregator<BV>::combine_and(bvector_type& bv_target,
1077 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
1078 size_t src_size)
1079{
1080 BM_ASSERT(!bv_target.is_ro()); // immutable vector used as a target
1081 if (src_size == 1)
1082 {
1083 const bvector_type* bv = bv_src[0];
1084 bv_target = *bv;
1085 return;
1086 }
1087 if (!src_size)
1088 {
1089 bv_target.clear();
1090 return;
1091 }
1092 ag_.reset();
1093 ar_->reset_and_blocks();
1094 unsigned top_blocks = resize_target(bv_target, bv_src, src_size);
1095 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
1096 {
1097 // TODO: find range, not just size
1098 unsigned set_array_max =
1099 find_effective_sub_block_size(i, bv_src, src_size, true);
1100 for (unsigned j = 0; j < set_array_max; ++j)
1101 {
1102 // TODO: use block_managers not bvectors to avoid extra indirect
1103 combine_and(i, j, bv_target, bv_src, src_size);
1104 } // for j
1105 } // for i
1106}
1107
1108// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1109
1110template<typename BV>
1111bool aggregator<BV>::combine_and_sub(bvector_type& bv_target,
1112 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and, size_t src_and_size,
1113 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_sub, size_t src_sub_size,
1114 bool any)
1115{
1116 BM_ASSERT(!bv_target.is_ro()); // immutable vector used as a target
1117 bool global_found = false;
1118
1119 if (!bv_src_and || !src_and_size)
1120 {
1121 bv_target.clear();
1122 return false;
1123 }
1124
1125 blocks_manager_type& bman_target = bv_target.get_blocks_manager();
1126
1127 unsigned top_blocks = resize_target(bv_target, bv_src_and, src_and_size);
1128 unsigned top_blocks2 = resize_target(bv_target, bv_src_sub, src_sub_size, false);
1129
1130 if (top_blocks2 > top_blocks)
1131 top_blocks = top_blocks2;
1132
1133 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
1134 {
1135 const unsigned set_array_max =
1136 find_effective_sub_block_size(i, bv_src_and, src_and_size,
1137 bv_src_sub, src_sub_size);
1138 for (unsigned j = 0; j < set_array_max; ++j)
1139 {
1140 int is_res_full;
1141 digest_type digest = combine_and_sub(i, j,
1142 0, bv_src_and, src_and_size,
1143 0, bv_src_sub, src_sub_size,
1144 &is_res_full);
1145 if (is_res_full)
1146 {
1147 bman_target.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
1148 bman_target.set_block_ptr(i, j, (bm::word_t*)FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
1149 if (j == bm::set_sub_array_size-1)
1150 bman_target.validate_top_full(i);
1151 if (any)
1152 return any;
1153 }
1154 else
1155 {
1156 bool found = digest;
1157 if (found)
1158 {
1159 bman_target.opt_copy_bit_block(i, j, tb_ar_->tb1,
1160 bvector_type::opt_compress, tb_ar_->tb_opt);
1161 if (any)
1162 return found;
1163 }
1164 global_found |= found;
1165 }
1166 } // for j
1167 } // for i
1168 return global_found;
1169}
1170
1171// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1172
1173template<typename BV> template<class TPipe>
1174void aggregator<BV>::combine_and_sub(TPipe& pipe)
1175{
1176 BM_ASSERT(pipe.is_complete());
1177
1178 const arg_vector_type& pipe_args = pipe.get_args_vector();
1179 size_t pipe_size = pipe_args.size();
1180 if (!pipe_size)
1181 return;
1182
1183 reset_vars();
1184
1185 bcache_ptr_ = &pipe.get_bcache(); // setup common cache block
1186
1187 unsigned top_blocks = pipe.get_top_blocks();
1188 BM_ASSERT(top_blocks);
1189
1190 if (pipe.bv_or_target_)
1191 pipe.bv_or_target_->get_blocks_manager().reserve_top_blocks(top_blocks);
1192
1193 unsigned i_from(0), j_from(0), i_to(0), j_to(0);
1194 if (range_set_)
1195 {
1196 typename bvector_type::block_idx_type nb;
1197 nb = (range_from_ >> bm::set_block_shift);
1198 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i_from, j_from);
1199 nb = (range_to_ >> bm::set_block_shift);
1200 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i_to, j_to);
1201 }
1202
1203
1204 size_t batch_size = pipe.get_options().batch_size;
1205 if (!batch_size)
1206 batch_size = pipe.compute_run_batch();
1207
1208 for (size_t batch_from(0), batch_to(0); batch_from < pipe_size;
1209 batch_from = batch_to)
1210 {
1211 batch_to = batch_from + batch_size;
1212 if (batch_to > pipe_size)
1213 batch_to = pipe_size;
1214 if (!batch_size)
1215 batch_size = 1;
1216 for (unsigned i = i_from; i < top_blocks; ++i)
1217 {
1218 unsigned j(0), sub_size(bm::set_sub_array_size);
1219 if constexpr(TPipe::options_type::is_masks())
1220 {
1221 if (range_set_)
1222 {
1223 if (i == i_from)
1224 j = j_from;
1225 if (i == i_to)
1226 sub_size = j_to+1;
1227 }
1228 }
1229
1230 for (; j < sub_size; ++j)
1231 {
1232 size_t p = batch_from;
1233 for (; p < batch_to; ++p)
1234 {
1235 const arg_groups* ag = pipe_args[p];
1236 size_t src_and_size = ag->arg_bv0.size();
1237 if (!src_and_size)
1238 continue;
1239
1240 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and = ag->arg_bv0.data();
1241 const size_t* bv_src_and_idx = ag->arg_idx0.data();
1242
1243 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_sub = ag->arg_bv1.data();
1244 const size_t* bv_src_sub_idx = ag->arg_idx1.data();
1245 size_t src_sub_size = ag->arg_bv1.size();
1246
1247 if constexpr (TPipe::options_type::is_compute_counts())
1248 {
1249 // if search limit reached
1250 if (pipe.count_res_vect_[p] >= pipe.search_count_limit_)
1251 continue;
1252 }
1253
1254 int is_res_full;
1255 digest_type digest = combine_and_sub(i, j,
1256 bv_src_and_idx,
1257 bv_src_and, src_and_size,
1258 bv_src_sub_idx,
1259 bv_src_sub, src_sub_size,
1260 &is_res_full);
1261 if (digest || is_res_full)
1262 {
1263 if (pipe.bv_or_target_)
1264 {
1265 blocks_manager_type& bman =
1266 pipe.bv_or_target_->get_blocks_manager();
1267 const bm::word_t* arg_blk =
1268 (is_res_full) ? (bm::word_t*)FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR
1269 : tb_ar_->tb1;
1270 bman.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
1271 bm::word_t* blk = bman.get_block_ptr(i, j);
1272 pipe.bv_or_target_->combine_operation_block_or(
1273 i, j, blk, arg_blk);
1274 }
1275 if constexpr (!TPipe::options_type::is_make_results()) // drop results
1276 {
1277 if constexpr (TPipe::options_type::is_compute_counts())
1278 {
1279 if (is_res_full)
1280 pipe.count_res_vect_[p]+=bm::gap_max_bits;
1281 else
1282 pipe.count_res_vect_[p]+=
1283 bm::bit_block_count(tb_ar_->tb1, digest);
1284 }
1285 }
1286 else // results requested
1287 {
1288 bvect_vector_type& bv_targets_vect =
1289 pipe.get_bv_res_vector();
1290 bvector_type* bv_target = bv_targets_vect[p];
1291 if (!bv_target)
1292 {
1293 BM_ASSERT(!bv_targets_vect[p]);
1294 bv_target = new bvector_type(bm::BM_GAP);
1295 bv_targets_vect[p] = bv_target;
1296 typename bvector_type::blocks_manager_type& bman =
1297 bv_target->get_blocks_manager();
1298
1299 bman.reserve_top_blocks(top_blocks);
1300 }
1301 blocks_manager_type& bman =
1302 bv_target->get_blocks_manager();
1303 if (is_res_full)
1304 {
1305 bman.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
1306 bman.set_block_ptr(i, j,
1307 (bm::word_t*)FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
1308 if (j == bm::set_sub_array_size-1)
1309 bman.validate_top_full(i);
1310 if constexpr (TPipe::options_type::is_compute_counts())
1311 pipe.count_res_vect_[p] += bm::gap_max_bits;
1312 }
1313 else
1314 {
1315 if constexpr (TPipe::options_type::is_compute_counts())
1316 pipe.count_res_vect_[p] +=
1317 bm::bit_block_count(tb_ar_->tb1, digest);
1318 bman.opt_copy_bit_block(i, j, tb_ar_->tb1,
1319 bvector_type::opt_compress, tb_ar_->tb_opt);
1320 }
1321 }
1322 } // if
1323 } // for p
1324 // optimize OR target to save memory
1325 if (pipe.bv_or_target_ && p == pipe_size) // last batch is done
1326 {
1327 blocks_manager_type& bman =
1328 pipe.bv_or_target_->get_blocks_manager();
1329 if (bm::word_t* blk = bman.get_block_ptr(i, j))
1330 bman.optimize_block(i, j, blk,
1331 tb_ar_->tb_opt, bvector_type::opt_compress, 0);
1332 }
1333 } // for j
1334 } // for i
1335 } // for batch
1336
1337 bcache_ptr_ = 0;
1338}
1339
1340// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1341
1342template<typename BV>
1343bool aggregator<BV>::find_first_and_sub(size_type& idx,
1344 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and, size_t src_and_size,
1345 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_sub, size_t src_sub_size)
1346{
1347 if (!bv_src_and || !src_and_size)
1348 return false;
1349
1350 unsigned top_blocks = max_top_blocks(bv_src_and, src_and_size);
1351 unsigned top_blocks2 = max_top_blocks(bv_src_sub, src_sub_size);
1352
1353 if (top_blocks2 > top_blocks)
1354 top_blocks = top_blocks2;
1355
1356 // compute range blocks coordinates
1357 //
1358 block_idx_type nblock_from = (range_from_ >> bm::set_block_shift);
1359 block_idx_type nblock_to = (range_to_ >> bm::set_block_shift);
1360 unsigned top_from = unsigned(nblock_from >> bm::set_array_shift);
1361 unsigned top_to = unsigned(nblock_to >> bm::set_array_shift);
1362
1363 if (range_set_)
1364 {
1365 if (nblock_from == nblock_to) // one block search
1366 {
1367 int is_res_full;
1368 unsigned i = top_from;
1369 unsigned j = unsigned(nblock_from & bm::set_array_mask);
1370 digest_type digest = combine_and_sub(i, j,
1371 0, bv_src_and, src_and_size,
1372 0, bv_src_sub, src_sub_size,
1373 &is_res_full);
1374 // is_res_full is not needed here, since it is just 1 block
1375 if (digest)
1376 {
1377 unsigned block_bit_idx = 0;
1378 bool found = bm::bit_find_first(tb_ar_->tb1, &block_bit_idx, digest);
1379 BM_ASSERT(found);
1380 idx = bm::block_to_global_index(i, j, block_bit_idx);
1381 return found;
1382 }
1383 return false;
1384 }
1385
1386 if (top_to < top_blocks)
1387 top_blocks = top_to+1;
1388 }
1389 else
1390 {
1391 top_from = 0;
1392 }
1393
1394 for (unsigned i = top_from; i < top_blocks; ++i)
1395 {
1396 unsigned set_array_max = bm::set_sub_array_size;
1397 unsigned j = 0;
1398 if (range_set_)
1399 {
1400 if (i == top_from)
1401 {
1402 j = nblock_from & bm::set_array_mask;
1403 }
1404 if (i == top_to)
1405 {
1406 set_array_max = 1 + unsigned(nblock_to & bm::set_array_mask);
1407 }
1408 }
1409 else
1410 {
1411 set_array_max = find_effective_sub_block_size(i, bv_src_and, src_and_size, true);
1412 if (!set_array_max)
1413 continue;
1414 if (src_sub_size)
1415 {
1416 unsigned set_array_max2 =
1417 find_effective_sub_block_size(i, bv_src_sub, src_sub_size, false);
1418 // TODO: should it be set_array_max2 < set_array_max ????
1419 //if (set_array_max2 > set_array_max)
1420 if (set_array_max2 < set_array_max)
1421 set_array_max = set_array_max2;
1422 }
1423 }
1424 for (; j < set_array_max; ++j)
1425 {
1426 int is_res_full;
1427 digest_type digest = combine_and_sub(i, j,
1428 0, bv_src_and, src_and_size,
1429 0, bv_src_sub, src_sub_size,
1430 &is_res_full);
1431 if (digest)
1432 {
1433 unsigned block_bit_idx = 0;
1434 bool found = bm::bit_find_first(tb_ar_->tb1, &block_bit_idx, digest);
1435 BM_ASSERT(found);
1436 idx = bm::block_to_global_index(i, j, block_bit_idx);
1437 return found;
1438 }
1439 } // for j
1440 //while (++j < set_array_max);
1441 } // for i
1442 return false;
1443}
1444
1445// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1446
1447template<typename BV>
1448unsigned
1449aggregator<BV>::find_effective_sub_block_size(
1450 unsigned i,
1451 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
1452 size_t src_size,
1453 bool top_null_as_zero) BMNOEXCEPT
1454{
1455 // quick hack to avoid scanning large, arrays, where such scan can be quite
1456 // expensive by itself (this makes this function approximate)
1457 if (src_size > 32)
1458 return bm::set_sub_array_size;
1459
1460 unsigned max_size = 1;
1461 for (size_t k = 0; k < src_size; ++k)
1462 {
1463 const bvector_type* bv = bv_src[k];
1464 BM_ASSERT(bv);
1465 const typename bvector_type::blocks_manager_type& bman_arg =
1466 bv->get_blocks_manager();
1467 const bm::word_t* const* blk_blk_arg = bman_arg.get_topblock(i);
1468 if (!blk_blk_arg)
1469 {
1470 if (top_null_as_zero)
1471 return 0;
1472 continue;
1473 }
1474 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
1475 return bm::set_sub_array_size;
1476
1477 for (unsigned j = bm::set_sub_array_size - 1; j > max_size; --j)
1478 {
1479 if (blk_blk_arg[j])
1480 {
1481 max_size = j;
1482 break;
1483 }
1484 } // for j
1485 if (max_size == bm::set_sub_array_size - 1)
1486 break;
1487 } // for k
1488 ++max_size;
1489 BM_ASSERT(max_size <= bm::set_sub_array_size);
1490
1491 return max_size;
1492}
1493
1494// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1495
1496template<typename BV>
1497unsigned aggregator<BV>::find_effective_sub_block_size(unsigned i,
1498 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src1,
1499 size_t src_size1,
1500 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src2,
1501 size_t src_size2) BMNOEXCEPT
1502{
1503 unsigned set_array_max = find_effective_sub_block_size(i, bv_src1, src_size1, true);
1504 if (set_array_max && src_size2)
1505 {
1506 unsigned set_array_max2 =
1507 find_effective_sub_block_size(i, bv_src2, src_size2, false);
1508 if (set_array_max2 > set_array_max) // TODO: use range intersect
1509 set_array_max = set_array_max2;
1510 }
1511 return set_array_max;
1512}
1513
1514
1515// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1516
1517template<typename BV>
1518void aggregator<BV>::combine_or(unsigned i, unsigned j,
1519 bvector_type& bv_target,
1520 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
1521 size_t src_size)
1522{
1523 typename bvector_type::blocks_manager_type& bman_target =
1524 bv_target.get_blocks_manager();
1525
1526 ar_->reset_or_blocks();
1527 bm::word_t* blk = sort_input_blocks_or(0, bv_src, src_size, i, j);
1528
1529 BM_ASSERT(blk == 0 || blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
1530
1531 if (blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR) // nothing to do - golden block(!)
1532 {
1533 bman_target.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
1534 bman_target.set_block_ptr(i, j, blk);
1535 if (++j == bm::set_sub_array_size)
1536 bman_target.validate_top_full(i);
1537 }
1538 else
1539 {
1540 size_t arg_blk_count = ar_->v_arg_or_blk.size();
1541 size_t arg_blk_gap_count = ar_->v_arg_or_blk_gap.size();
1542 if (arg_blk_count || arg_blk_gap_count)
1543 {
1544 bool all_one = process_bit_blocks_or(bman_target, i, j, *ar_);
1545 if (!all_one)
1546 {
1547 if (arg_blk_gap_count)
1548 process_gap_blocks_or(*ar_);
1549 // we have some results, allocate block and copy from temp
1550 bman_target.opt_copy_bit_block(i, j, tb_ar_->tb1,
1551 opt_mode_, tb_ar_->tb_opt);
1552 }
1553 }
1554 }
1555}
1556
1557// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1558
1559template<typename BV>
1560void aggregator<BV>::combine_and(unsigned i, unsigned j,
1561 bvector_type& bv_target,
1562 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
1563 size_t src_and_size)
1564{
1565 BM_ASSERT(src_and_size);
1566
1567 bm::word_t* blk = sort_input_blocks_and(0, bv_src, src_and_size, i, j);
1568 BM_ASSERT(blk == 0 || blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
1569 if (!blk) // nothing to do - golden block(!)
1570 return;
1571
1572 size_t arg_blk_and_count = ar_->v_arg_and_blk.size();
1573 size_t arg_blk_and_gap_count = ar_->v_arg_and_blk_gap.size();
1574 if (arg_blk_and_count || arg_blk_and_gap_count)
1575 {
1576 if (!arg_blk_and_gap_count && (arg_blk_and_count == 1))
1577 {
1578 if (ar_->v_arg_and_blk[0] == FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR)
1579 {
1580 // another nothing to do: one FULL block
1581 blocks_manager_type& bman_target = bv_target.get_blocks_manager();
1582 bman_target.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
1583 bman_target.set_block_ptr(i, j, blk);
1584 if (++j == bm::set_sub_array_size)
1585 bman_target.validate_top_full(i);
1586 return;
1587 }
1588 }
1589 // AND bit-blocks
1590 //
1591 bm::id64_t digest = ~0ull;
1592 digest = process_bit_blocks_and(*ar_, digest);
1593 if (!digest)
1594 return;
1595
1596 // AND all GAP blocks (if any)
1597 //
1598 if (arg_blk_and_gap_count)
1599 {
1600 digest = process_gap_blocks_and(*ar_, digest);
1601 }
1602 if (digest) // we have results , allocate block and copy from temp
1603 {
1604 blocks_manager_type& bman_target = bv_target.get_blocks_manager();
1605 bman_target.opt_copy_bit_block(i, j, tb_ar_->tb1,
1606 opt_mode_, tb_ar_->tb_opt);
1607 }
1608 }
1609}
1610
1611// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1612
1613template<typename BV>
1614typename aggregator<BV>::digest_type
1615aggregator<BV>::combine_and_sub(
1616 unsigned i, unsigned j,
1617 const size_t* and_idx,
1618 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and, size_t src_and_size,
1619 const size_t* sub_idx,
1620 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_sub, size_t src_sub_size,
1621 int* is_result_full)
1622{
1623 BM_ASSERT(src_and_size);
1624 BM_ASSERT(is_result_full);
1625
1626 *is_result_full = 0;
1627 bm::word_t* blk = sort_input_blocks_and(and_idx, bv_src_and, src_and_size, i, j);
1628 BM_ASSERT(blk == 0 || blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
1629 if (!blk)
1630 return 0; // nothing to do - golden block(!)
1631
1632 {
1633 size_t arg_blk_and_count = ar_->v_arg_and_blk.size();
1634 size_t arg_blk_and_gap_count = ar_->v_arg_and_blk_gap.size();
1635 if (!(arg_blk_and_count | arg_blk_and_gap_count))
1636 return 0; // nothing to do - golden block(!)
1637
1638 ar_->reset_or_blocks();
1639 if (src_sub_size)
1640 {
1641 blk = sort_input_blocks_or(sub_idx, bv_src_sub, src_sub_size, i, j);
1642 BM_ASSERT(blk == 0 || blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
1643 if (blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
1644 return 0; // nothing to do - golden block(!)
1645 }
1646 else
1647 {
1648 if (!arg_blk_and_gap_count && (arg_blk_and_count == 1))
1649 {
1650 if (ar_->v_arg_and_blk[0] == FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR)
1651 {
1652 *is_result_full = 1;
1653 return ~0ull;
1654 }
1655 }
1656 }
1657 }
1658
1659 digest_type digest = ~0ull;
1660
1661 // AND-SUB bit-blocks
1662 //
1663 digest = process_bit_blocks_and(*ar_, digest);
1664 if (!digest)
1665 return digest;
1666 digest = process_bit_blocks_sub(*ar_, digest);
1667 if (!digest)
1668 return digest;
1669
1670 // AND all GAP block
1671 //
1672 digest = process_gap_blocks_and(*ar_, digest);
1673 if (!digest)
1674 return digest;
1675
1676 digest = process_gap_blocks_sub(*ar_, digest);
1677
1678 return digest;
1679}
1680
1681// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1682
1683template<typename BV>
1684void aggregator<BV>::process_gap_blocks_or(const arena& ar)//size_t arg_blk_gap_count)
1685{
1686 size_t arg_blk_gap_count = ar.v_arg_or_blk_gap.size();
1687 bm::word_t* blk = tb_ar_->tb1;
1688 for (size_t k = 0; k < arg_blk_gap_count; ++k)
1689 bm::gap_add_to_bitset(blk, ar.v_arg_or_blk_gap[k]);
1690}
1691
1692// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1693
1694template<typename BV>
1695typename aggregator<BV>::digest_type
1696aggregator<BV>::process_gap_blocks_and(const arena& ar,
1697 digest_type digest)
1698{
1699 bm::word_t* blk = tb_ar_->tb1;
1700 size_t arg_blk_gap_count = ar.v_arg_and_blk_gap.size();
1701 bool single_bit_found;
1702 unsigned single_bit_idx;
1703 for (size_t k = 0; k < arg_blk_gap_count; ++k)
1704 {
1705 bm::gap_and_to_bitset(blk, ar.v_arg_and_blk_gap[k], digest);
1706 digest = bm::update_block_digest0(blk, digest);
1707 if (!digest)
1708 {
1709 BM_ASSERT(bm::bit_is_all_zero(blk));
1710 break;
1711 }
1712 if (bm::word_bitcount64(digest) == 1)
1713 {
1714 single_bit_found = bm::bit_find_first_if_1(blk, &single_bit_idx, digest);
1715 if (single_bit_found)
1716 {
1717 for (++k; k < arg_blk_gap_count; ++k)
1718 {
1719 bool b = bm::gap_test_unr(ar.v_arg_and_blk_gap[k], single_bit_idx);
1720 if (!b)
1721 return 0; // AND 0 causes result to turn 0
1722 } // for k
1723 break;
1724 }
1725 }
1726 }
1727 return digest;
1728}
1729
1730// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1731
1732template<typename BV>
1733typename aggregator<BV>::digest_type
1734aggregator<BV>::process_gap_blocks_sub(const arena& ar,
1735 digest_type digest)
1736{
1737 size_t arg_blk_gap_count = ar.v_arg_or_blk_gap.size();
1738 bm::word_t* blk = tb_ar_->tb1;
1739 bool single_bit_found;
1740 unsigned single_bit_idx;
1741 for (size_t k = 0; k < arg_blk_gap_count; ++k)
1742 {
1743 bm::gap_sub_to_bitset(blk, ar.v_arg_or_blk_gap[k], digest);
1744 digest = bm::update_block_digest0(blk, digest);
1745 if (!digest)
1746 {
1747 BM_ASSERT(bm::bit_is_all_zero(blk));
1748 break;
1749 }
1750 // check if logical operation reduced to a corner case of one single bit
1751 if (bm::word_bitcount64(digest) == 1)
1752 {
1753 single_bit_found = bm::bit_find_first_if_1(blk, &single_bit_idx, digest);
1754 if (single_bit_found)
1755 {
1756 for (++k; k < arg_blk_gap_count; ++k)
1757 {
1758 bool b = bm::gap_test_unr(ar.v_arg_or_blk_gap[k], single_bit_idx);
1759 if (b)
1760 return 0; // AND-NOT causes search result to turn 0
1761 } // for k
1762 break;
1763 }
1764 }
1765 } // for k
1766 return digest;
1767}
1768
1769// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1770
1771template<typename BV>
1772bool aggregator<BV>::test_gap_blocks_and(size_t arg_blk_gap_count,
1773 unsigned bit_idx)
1774{
1775 unsigned b = 1;
1776 for (size_t i = 0; i < arg_blk_gap_count && b; ++i)
1777 b = bm::gap_test_unr(ar_->v_arg_and_blk_gap[i], bit_idx);
1778 return b;
1779}
1780
1781// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1782
1783template<typename BV>
1784bool aggregator<BV>::test_gap_blocks_sub(size_t arg_blk_gap_count,
1785 unsigned bit_idx)
1786{
1787 unsigned b = 1;
1788 for (size_t i = 0; i < arg_blk_gap_count; ++i)
1789 {
1790 b = bm::gap_test_unr(ar_->v_arg_or_blk_gap[i], bit_idx);
1791 if (b)
1792 return false;
1793 }
1794 return true;
1795}
1796
1797// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1798
1799
1800template<typename BV>
1801bool aggregator<BV>::process_bit_blocks_or(blocks_manager_type& bman_target,
1802 unsigned i, unsigned j,
1803 const arena& ar)
1804{
1805 size_t arg_blk_count = ar.v_arg_or_blk.size();
1806 bm::word_t* blk = tb_ar_->tb1;
1807 bool all_one;
1808
1809 size_t k = 0;
1810
1811 if (arg_blk_count) // copy the first block
1812 bm::bit_block_copy(blk, ar.v_arg_or_blk[k++]);
1813 else
1814 bm::bit_block_set(blk, 0);
1815
1816 // process all BIT blocks
1817 //
1818 size_t unroll_factor, len, len_unr;
1819
1820 unroll_factor = 4;
1821 len = arg_blk_count - k;
1822 len_unr = len - (len % unroll_factor);
1823 for( ;k < len_unr; k+=unroll_factor)
1824 {
1825 all_one = bm::bit_block_or_5way(blk,
1826 ar.v_arg_or_blk[k], ar.v_arg_or_blk[k+1],
1827 ar.v_arg_or_blk[k+2], ar.v_arg_or_blk[k+3]);
1828 if (all_one)
1829 {
1830 BM_ASSERT(blk == tb_ar_->tb1);
1831 BM_ASSERT(bm::is_bits_one((bm::wordop_t*) blk));
1832 bman_target.set_block(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR, false);
1833 return true;
1834 }
1835 } // for k
1836
1837 unroll_factor = 2;
1838 len = arg_blk_count - k;
1839 len_unr = len - (len % unroll_factor);
1840 for( ;k < len_unr; k+=unroll_factor)
1841 {
1842 all_one = bm::bit_block_or_3way(blk, ar.v_arg_or_blk[k], ar.v_arg_or_blk[k+1]);
1843 if (all_one)
1844 {
1845 BM_ASSERT(blk == tb_ar_->tb1);
1846 BM_ASSERT(bm::is_bits_one((bm::wordop_t*) blk));
1847 bman_target.set_block(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR, false);
1848 return true;
1849 }
1850 } // for k
1851
1852 for (; k < arg_blk_count; ++k)
1853 {
1854 all_one = bm::bit_block_or(blk, ar.v_arg_or_blk[k]);
1855 if (all_one)
1856 {
1857 BM_ASSERT(blk == tb_ar_->tb1);
1858 BM_ASSERT(bm::is_bits_one((bm::wordop_t*) blk));
1859 bman_target.set_block(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR, false);
1860 return true;
1861 }
1862 } // for k
1863
1864 return false;
1865}
1866
1867// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1868
1869template<typename BV>
1870typename aggregator<BV>::digest_type
1871aggregator<BV>::process_bit_blocks_and(const arena& ar,
1872 digest_type digest)
1873{
1874 bm::word_t* blk = tb_ar_->tb1;
1875 size_t k = 0;
1876 size_t arg_blk_count = ar.v_arg_and_blk.size();
1877
1878 const word_t** args = ar.v_arg_and_blk.data();
1879
1880 block_idx_type nb_from = (range_from_ >> bm::set_block_shift);
1881 block_idx_type nb_to = (range_to_ >> bm::set_block_shift);
1882 if (range_set_ && (nb_from == nb_to))
1883 {
1884 unsigned nbit_from = unsigned(range_from_ & bm::set_block_mask);
1885 unsigned nbit_to = unsigned(range_to_ & bm::set_block_mask);
1886 digest_type digest0 = bm::digest_mask(nbit_from, nbit_to);
1887 digest &= digest0;
1888 bm::block_init_digest0(blk, digest);
1889 }
1890 else
1891 {
1892 switch (arg_blk_count)
1893 {
1894 case 0:
1895 bm::block_init_digest0(blk, digest); // 0xFF... by default
1896 return digest;
1897 case 1:
1898 bm::bit_block_copy(blk, args[k]);
1899 return bm::calc_block_digest0(blk);
1900 default:
1901 digest = bm::bit_block_and_2way(blk, args[k], args[k+1], ~0ull);
1902 k += 2;
1903 break;
1904 } // switch
1905 }
1906
1907 size_t unroll_factor, len, len_unr;
1908 unsigned single_bit_idx;
1909
1910 unroll_factor = 4;
1911 len = arg_blk_count - k;
1912 len_unr = len - (len % unroll_factor);
1913 for (; k < len_unr; k += unroll_factor)
1914 {
1915 digest =
1916 bm::bit_block_and_5way(blk,
1917 args[k], args[k + 1],
1918 args[k + 2], args[k + 3],
1919 digest);
1920 if (!digest) // all zero
1921 return digest;
1922 if (bm::word_bitcount64(digest) == 1)
1923 {
1924 bool found = bm::bit_find_first_if_1(blk, &single_bit_idx, digest);
1925 if (found)
1926 {
1927 unsigned nword = unsigned(single_bit_idx >> bm::set_word_shift);
1928 unsigned mask = 1u << (single_bit_idx & bm::set_word_mask);
1929 for (++k; k < arg_blk_count; ++k)
1930 {
1931 if (!(mask & args[k][nword]))
1932 {
1933 blk[nword] = 0;
1934 return 0;
1935 }
1936 } // for k
1937 break;
1938 }
1939 }
1940 } // for k
1941
1942 for (; k < arg_blk_count; ++k)
1943 {/*
1944 if (ar_->v_arg_and_blk[k] == FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR)
1945 continue;*/
1946 digest = bm::bit_block_and(blk, args[k], digest);
1947 if (!digest) // all zero
1948 return digest;
1949 } // for k
1950 return digest;
1951}
1952
1953// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
1954
1955template<typename BV>
1956typename aggregator<BV>::digest_type
1957aggregator<BV>::process_bit_blocks_sub(const arena& ar,
1958 digest_type digest)
1959{
1960 size_t arg_blk_count = ar.v_arg_or_blk.size();
1961 bm::word_t* blk = tb_ar_->tb1;
1962 unsigned single_bit_idx;
1963 const word_t** args = ar.v_arg_or_blk.data();
1964
1965 size_t k = 0;
1966 for (; k < arg_blk_count; ++k)
1967 {
1968 /*
1969 if (ar.v_arg_or_blk[k] == FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR) // golden block
1970 {
1971 digest = 0;
1972 break;
1973 } */
1974 digest = bm::bit_block_sub(blk, args[k], digest);
1975 if (!digest) // all zero
1976 break;
1977 if (bm::word_bitcount64(digest) == 1)
1978 {
1979 bool found = bm::bit_find_first_if_1(blk, &single_bit_idx, digest);
1980 if (found)
1981 {
1982 const unsigned mask = 1u << (single_bit_idx & bm::set_word_mask);
1983 unsigned nword = unsigned(single_bit_idx >> bm::set_word_shift);
1984 for (++k; k < arg_blk_count; ++k)
1985 {
1986 if (mask & args[k][nword])
1987 {
1988 blk[nword] = 0;
1989 return 0;
1990 }
1991 } // for k
1992 return digest;
1993 }
1994 }
1995 } // for k
1996 return digest;
1997}
1998
1999// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2000
2001template<typename BV>
2002unsigned aggregator<BV>::resize_target(bvector_type& bv_target,
2003 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src, size_t src_size,
2004 bool init_clear)
2005{
2006 typename bvector_type::blocks_manager_type& bman_target = bv_target.get_blocks_manager();
2007 if (init_clear)
2008 {
2009 if (bman_target.is_init())
2010 bman_target.deinit_tree();
2011 }
2012
2013 unsigned top_blocks = bman_target.top_block_size();
2014 size_type size = bv_target.size();
2015 bool need_realloc = false;
2016
2017 // pre-scan to do target size harmonization
2018 for (unsigned i = 0; i < src_size; ++i)
2019 {
2020 const bvector_type* bv = bv_src[i];
2021 BM_ASSERT(bv);
2022 const typename bvector_type::blocks_manager_type& bman_arg =
2023 bv->get_blocks_manager();
2024 unsigned arg_top_blocks = bman_arg.top_block_size();
2025 if (arg_top_blocks > top_blocks)
2026 {
2027 need_realloc = true;
2028 top_blocks = arg_top_blocks;
2029 }
2030 size_type arg_size = bv->size();
2031 if (arg_size > size)
2032 size = arg_size;
2033 } // for i
2034
2035 if (need_realloc)
2036 bman_target.reserve_top_blocks(top_blocks);
2037 if (!bman_target.is_init())
2038 bman_target.init_tree();
2039 if (size > bv_target.size())
2040 bv_target.resize(size);
2041
2042 return top_blocks;
2043}
2044
2045// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2046
2047template<typename BV>
2048unsigned
2049aggregator<BV>::max_top_blocks(const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
2050 size_t src_size) BMNOEXCEPT
2051{
2052 unsigned top_blocks = 1;
2053
2054 // pre-scan to do target size harmonization
2055 for (unsigned i = 0; i < src_size; ++i)
2056 {
2057 const bvector_type* bv = bv_src[i];
2058 if (!bv)
2059 continue;
2060 const typename bvector_type::blocks_manager_type& bman_arg = bv->get_blocks_manager();
2061 unsigned arg_top_blocks = bman_arg.top_block_size();
2062 if (arg_top_blocks > top_blocks)
2063 top_blocks = arg_top_blocks;
2064 } // for i
2065 return top_blocks;
2066}
2067
2068// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2069
2070template<typename BV>
2071bm::word_t* aggregator<BV>::sort_input_blocks_or(
2072 const size_t* src_idx,
2073 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
2074 size_t src_size,
2075 unsigned i, unsigned j)
2076{
2077 bm::word_t* blk = 0;
2078 ar_->v_arg_or_blk.reset(); ar_->v_arg_or_blk_gap.reset();
2079 for (size_t k = 0; k < src_size; ++k)
2080 {
2081 const bm::word_t* arg_blk =
2082 bv_src[k]->get_blocks_manager().get_block_ptr(i, j);
2083 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk))
2084 {
2085 (void)src_idx;
2086#if (0)
2087 if (bcache_ptr_)
2088 {
2089 BM_ASSERT(bv == bcache_ptr_->bv_inp_vect_[src_idx[k]]);
2090 bm::word_t* bit_blk = cache_gap_block(arg_blk, src_idx, k, i, j);
2091 if (bit_blk)
2092 {
2093 ar_->v_arg_or_blk.push_back(bit_blk); // use cached bit-block for operation
2094 continue;
2095 }
2096 } // bcache_ptr_
2097#endif
2098 ar_->v_arg_or_blk_gap.push_back(BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk));
2099 }
2100 else // FULL or bit block
2101 {
2102 if (!arg_blk)
2103 continue;
2104 if (arg_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
2105 return FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR;
2106 ar_->v_arg_or_blk.push_back(arg_blk);
2107 }
2108 } // for k
2109 return blk;
2110}
2111
2112// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2113
2114template<typename BV>
2115bm::word_t* aggregator<BV>::sort_input_blocks_and(
2116 const size_t* src_idx,
2117 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
2118 size_t src_size,
2119 unsigned i, unsigned j)
2120{
2121 ar_->v_arg_tmp_blk.resize_no_copy(src_size);
2122 auto blocks_arr = ar_->v_arg_tmp_blk.data();
2123 for (size_t k = 0; k < src_size; ++k)
2124 {
2125 const bm::word_t* arg_blk = blocks_arr[k] =
2126 bv_src[k]->get_blocks_manager().get_block_ptr(i, j);
2127 if (!arg_blk)
2128 return 0;
2129 }
2130
2131 bool has_full_blk = false;
2132 bm::word_t* blk = FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR;
2133 auto& bit_v = ar_->v_arg_and_blk;
2134 auto& gap_v = ar_->v_arg_and_blk_gap;
2135 bit_v.resize_no_copy(src_size);
2136 gap_v.resize_no_copy(src_size);
2137 size_t bc(0), gc(0);
2138
2139 auto bit_arr = bit_v.data();
2140 auto gap_arr = gap_v.data();
2141 for (size_t k = 0; k < src_size; ++k)
2142 {
2143 const bm::word_t* arg_blk = blocks_arr[k];
2144 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk))
2145 {
2146 const bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk);
2147 (void)src_idx;
2148#if (0)
2149 if (bcache_ptr_)
2150 {
2151 unsigned len = bm::gap_length(gap_blk);
2152 size_t bv_idx = src_idx[k];
2153 auto cnt = bcache_ptr_->cnt_vect_[bv_idx];
2154 if (cnt && len > 1024 && bc < (src_size / 4))
2155 {
2156 bm::word_t* bit_blk = cache_gap_block(arg_blk, src_idx, k, i, j);
2157 if (bit_blk)
2158 {
2159 bit_arr[bc++] = bit_blk; // use cached bit-block for operation
2160 continue;
2161 }
2162 }
2163 } // bcache_ptr_
2164#endif
2165 gap_arr[gc++] = gap_blk;
2166 continue;
2167 }
2168 // FULL or bit block
2169 if (arg_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
2170 {
2171 has_full_blk = true;
2172 continue;
2173 }
2174 bit_arr[bc++] = arg_blk;
2175
2176 } // for k
2177
2178 bit_v.resize_no_copy(bc);
2179 gap_v.resize_no_copy(gc);
2180
2181 if (has_full_blk && (!bc && !gc))
2182 bit_v.push_back(FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR);
2183
2184 return blk;
2185}
2186
2187// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2188
2189template<typename BV>
2190bm::word_t* aggregator<BV>::cache_gap_block(const bm::word_t* arg_blk,
2191 const size_t* src_idx,
2192 size_t k,
2193 unsigned i, unsigned j)
2194{
2195 BM_ASSERT(bcache_ptr_);
2196 BM_ASSERT(src_idx);
2197
2198 size_t bv_idx = src_idx[k];
2199 auto cnt = bcache_ptr_->cnt_vect_[bv_idx];
2200 if (cnt > 0) // frequent bector
2201 {
2202 bm::word_t* bit_blk = bcache_ptr_->blk_vect_[bv_idx];
2203 bm::pair<unsigned, unsigned> pair_ij = bcache_ptr_->blk_ij_vect_[bv_idx];
2204 if (!bit_blk)
2205 {
2206 bit_blk = (bm::word_t*)bm::aligned_new_malloc(bm::set_block_size * sizeof(bm::word_t));
2207 pair_ij.first = i+1; // make it NOT match
2208 bcache_ptr_->blk_vect_[bv_idx] = bit_blk;
2209 }
2210 // block is allocated
2211 if (i != pair_ij.first || j != pair_ij.second) // not NB cached?
2212 {
2213 bm::gap_convert_to_bitset(bit_blk, BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk));
2214 pair_ij.first = i; pair_ij.second = j;
2215 bcache_ptr_->blk_ij_vect_[bv_idx] = pair_ij;
2216 }
2217 ++gap_cache_cnt_;
2218 return bit_blk; // use cached bit-block for operation
2219 }
2220 return 0;
2221}
2222
2223// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2224
2225template<typename BV>
2226void aggregator<BV>::combine_or_horizontal(bvector_type& bv_target,
2227 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src, size_t src_size)
2228{
2229 BM_ASSERT(!bv_target.is_ro()); // immutable vector used as a target
2230 BM_ASSERT(src_size);
2231
2232 if (src_size == 0)
2233 {
2234 bv_target.clear();
2235 return;
2236 }
2237 const bvector_type* bv = bv_src[0];
2238 bv_target.copy(*bv, bm::BM_READWRITE);
2239 for (unsigned i = 1; i < src_size; ++i)
2240 {
2241 bv = bv_src[i];
2242 BM_ASSERT(bv);
2243 bv_target.bit_or(*bv);
2244 }
2245}
2246
2247// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2248
2249template<typename BV>
2250void aggregator<BV>::combine_and_horizontal(bvector_type& bv_target,
2251 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src, size_t src_size)
2252{
2253 BM_ASSERT(!bv_target.is_ro()); // immutable vector used as a target
2254 BM_ASSERT(src_size);
2255
2256 if (src_size == 0)
2257 {
2258 bv_target.clear();
2259 return;
2260 }
2261 const bvector_type* bv = bv_src[0];
2262 bv_target.copy(*bv, bm::BM_READWRITE);
2263
2264 for (unsigned i = 1; i < src_size; ++i)
2265 {
2266 bv = bv_src[i];
2267 BM_ASSERT(bv);
2268 bv_target.bit_and(*bv);
2269 }
2270}
2271
2272// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2273
2274template<typename BV>
2275void aggregator<BV>::combine_and_sub_horizontal(bvector_type& bv_target,
2276 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and,
2277 size_t src_and_size,
2278 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_sub,
2279 size_t src_sub_size)
2280{
2281 BM_ASSERT(src_and_size);
2282 BM_ASSERT(!bv_target.is_ro()); // immutable vector used as a target
2283
2284 combine_and_horizontal(bv_target, bv_src_and, src_and_size);
2285
2286 for (unsigned i = 0; i < src_sub_size; ++i)
2287 {
2288 const bvector_type* bv = bv_src_sub[i];
2289 BM_ASSERT(bv);
2290 bv_target -= *bv;
2291 }
2292}
2293
2294// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2295
2296template<typename BV>
2297void aggregator<BV>::prepare_shift_right_and(bvector_type& bv_target,
2298 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
2299 size_t src_size)
2300{
2301 top_block_size_ = resize_target(bv_target, bv_src, src_size);
2302
2303 // set initial carry overs all to 0
2304 ar_->carry_overs.resize(src_size);
2305 for (unsigned i = 0; i < src_size; ++i) // reset co flags
2306 ar_->carry_overs[i] = 0;
2307}
2308
2309// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2310
2311template<typename BV>
2312bool aggregator<BV>::combine_shift_right_and(
2313 bvector_type& bv_target,
2314 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and, size_t src_and_size,
2315 bool any)
2316{
2317 if (!src_and_size)
2318 {
2319 bv_target.clear();
2320 return false;
2321 }
2322 prepare_shift_right_and(bv_target, bv_src_and, src_and_size);
2323
2324 for (unsigned i = 0; i < bm::set_top_array_size; ++i)
2325 {
2326 if (i > top_block_size_)
2327 {
2328 if (!any_carry_overs(ar_->carry_overs.data(), src_and_size))
2329 break; // quit early if there is nothing to carry on
2330 }
2331
2332 unsigned j = 0;
2333 do
2334 {
2335 bool found =
2336 combine_shift_right_and(i, j, bv_target, bv_src_and, src_and_size);
2337 if (found && any)
2338 return found;
2339 } while (++j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
2340
2341 } // for i
2342
2343 if (compute_count_)
2344 return bool(count_);
2345
2346 return bv_target.any();
2347}
2348
2349// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2350
2351template<typename BV>
2352bool aggregator<BV>::combine_shift_right_and(unsigned i, unsigned j,
2353 bvector_type& bv_target,
2354 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
2355 size_t src_size)
2356{
2357 bm::word_t* blk = temp_blk_ ? temp_blk_ : tb_ar_->tb1;
2358 unsigned char* carry_overs = ar_->carry_overs.data();
2359
2360 bm::id64_t digest = ~0ull; // start with a full content digest
2361
2362 bool blk_zero = false;
2363 // first initial block is just copied over from the first AND
2364 {
2365 const blocks_manager_type& bman_arg = bv_src[0]->get_blocks_manager();
2366 BM_ASSERT(bman_arg.is_init());
2367 const bm::word_t* arg_blk = bman_arg.get_block(i, j);
2368 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk))
2369 {
2370 bm::bit_block_set(blk, 0);
2371 bm::gap_add_to_bitset(blk, BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk));
2372 }
2373 else
2374 {
2375 if (arg_blk)
2376 {
2377 bm::bit_block_copy(blk, arg_blk);
2378 }
2379 else
2380 {
2381 blk_zero = true; // set flag for delayed block init
2382 digest = 0;
2383 }
2384 }
2385 carry_overs[0] = 0;
2386 }
2387
2388 for (unsigned k = 1; k < src_size; ++k)
2389 {
2390 unsigned carry_over = carry_overs[k];
2391 if (!digest && !carry_over) // 0 into "00000" block >> 0
2392 continue;
2393 if (blk_zero) // delayed temp block 0-init requested
2394 {
2395 bm::bit_block_set(blk, 0);
2396 blk_zero = !blk_zero; // = false
2397 }
2398 const bm::word_t* arg_blk = get_arg_block(bv_src, k, i, j);
2399 carry_overs[k] = (unsigned char)
2400 process_shift_right_and(blk, arg_blk, digest, carry_over);
2401 BM_ASSERT(carry_overs[k] == 0 || carry_overs[k] == 1);
2402 } // for k
2403
2404 if (blk_zero) // delayed temp block 0-init
2405 {
2406 bm::bit_block_set(blk, 0);
2407 }
2408 // block now gets emitted into the target bit-vector
2409 if (digest)
2410 {
2411 BM_ASSERT(!bm::bit_is_all_zero(blk));
2412
2413 if (compute_count_)
2414 {
2415 unsigned cnt = bm::bit_block_count(blk, digest);
2416 count_ += cnt;
2417 }
2418 else
2419 {
2420 blocks_manager_type& bman_target = bv_target.get_blocks_manager();
2421 bman_target.opt_copy_bit_block(i, j, blk, opt_mode_, tb_ar_->tb_opt);
2422 }
2423 return true;
2424 }
2425 return false;
2426}
2427
2428// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2429
2430template<typename BV>
2431unsigned aggregator<BV>::process_shift_right_and(
2432 bm::word_t* BMRESTRICT blk,
2433 const bm::word_t* BMRESTRICT arg_blk,
2434 digest_type& BMRESTRICT digest,
2435 unsigned carry_over) BMNOEXCEPT
2436{
2437 BM_ASSERT(carry_over == 1 || carry_over == 0);
2438
2439 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk)) // GAP argument
2440 {
2441 if (digest)
2442 {
2443 carry_over =
2444 bm::bit_block_shift_r1_and_unr(blk, carry_over,
2445 FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR, &digest);
2446 }
2447 else // digest == 0, but carry_over can change that
2448 {
2449 blk[0] = carry_over;
2450 carry_over = 0;
2451 digest = blk[0]; // NOTE: this does NOT account for AND (yet)
2452 }
2453 BM_ASSERT(bm::calc_block_digest0(blk) == digest);
2454
2455 bm::gap_and_to_bitset(blk, BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk), digest);
2456 digest = bm::update_block_digest0(blk, digest);
2457 }
2458 else // 2 bit-blocks
2459 {
2460 if (arg_blk) // use fast fused SHIFT-AND operation
2461 {
2462 if (digest)
2463 {
2464 carry_over =
2465 bm::bit_block_shift_r1_and_unr(blk, carry_over, arg_blk,
2466 &digest);
2467 }
2468 else // digest == 0
2469 {
2470 blk[0] = carry_over & arg_blk[0];
2471 carry_over = 0;
2472 digest = blk[0];
2473 }
2474 BM_ASSERT(bm::calc_block_digest0(blk) == digest);
2475 }
2476 else // arg is zero - target block => zero
2477 {
2478 carry_over = blk[bm::set_block_size-1] >> 31; // carry out
2479 if (digest)
2480 {
2481 bm::bit_block_set(blk, 0); // TODO: digest based set
2482 digest = 0;
2483 }
2484 }
2485 }
2486 return carry_over;
2487}
2488
2489// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2490
2491template<typename BV>
2492const bm::word_t* aggregator<BV>::get_arg_block(
2493 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src,
2494 unsigned k, unsigned i, unsigned j) BMNOEXCEPT
2495{
2496 return bv_src[k]->get_blocks_manager().get_block(i, j);
2497}
2498
2499// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2500
2501template<typename BV>
2502bool aggregator<BV>::any_carry_overs(const unsigned char* carry_overs,
2503 size_t co_size) BMNOEXCEPT
2504{
2505 // TODO: loop unroll?
2506 unsigned acc = carry_overs[0];
2507 for (size_t i = 1; i < co_size; ++i)
2508 acc |= carry_overs[i];
2509 return acc;
2510}
2511
2512// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2513
2514template<typename BV>
2515void aggregator<BV>::stage(bm::word_t* temp_block)
2516{
2517 bvector_type* bv_target = check_create_target(); // create target vector
2518 BM_ASSERT(bv_target);
2519
2520 temp_blk_ = temp_block;
2521
2522 switch (operation_)
2523 {
2524 case BM_NOT_DEFINED:
2525 break;
2526 case BM_SHIFT_R_AND:
2527 prepare_shift_right_and(*bv_target, ag_.arg_bv0.data(), ag_.arg_bv0.size());//arg_group0_size);
2528 operation_status_ = op_prepared;
2529 break;
2530 default:
2531 BM_ASSERT(0);
2532 } // switch
2533}
2534
2535// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2536
2537template<typename BV>
2538typename aggregator<BV>::operation_status
2539aggregator<BV>::run_step(unsigned i, unsigned j)
2540{
2541 BM_ASSERT(operation_status_ == op_prepared || operation_status_ == op_in_progress);
2542 BM_ASSERT(j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
2543
2544 switch (operation_)
2545 {
2546 case BM_NOT_DEFINED:
2547 break;
2548
2549 case BM_SHIFT_R_AND:
2550 {
2551 if (i > top_block_size_)
2552 {
2553 if (!this->any_carry_overs(ar_->carry_overs.data(), ag_.arg_bv0.size()))//arg_group0_size))
2554 {
2555 operation_status_ = op_done;
2556 return operation_status_;
2557 }
2558 }
2559 //bool found =
2560 this->combine_shift_right_and(i, j, *bv_target_,
2561 ag_.arg_bv0.data(), ag_.arg_bv0.size());//arg_group0_size);
2562 operation_status_ = op_in_progress;
2563 }
2564 break;
2565 default:
2566 BM_ASSERT(0);
2567 break;
2568 } // switch
2569
2570 return operation_status_;
2571}
2572
2573
2574// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2575// aggregator::pipeline
2576// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2577
2578template<typename BV> template<class Opt>
2579aggregator<BV>::pipeline<Opt>::~pipeline() BMNOEXCEPT
2580{
2581 size_t sz = arg_vect_.size();
2582 arg_groups** arr = arg_vect_.data();
2583 for (size_t i = 0; i < sz; ++i)
2584 free_arg_group(arr[i]);
2585 sz = bv_res_vect_.size();
2586 bvector_type** bv_arr = bv_res_vect_.data();
2587 for (size_t i = 0; i < sz; ++i)
2588 {
2589 bvector_type* bv = bv_arr[i];
2590 delete bv;
2591 } // for i
2592 sz = bcache_.blk_vect_.size();
2593 bm::word_t** blk_arr = bcache_.blk_vect_.data();
2594 for (size_t i = 0; i < sz; ++i)
2595 bm::aligned_free(blk_arr[i]);
2596}
2597
2598// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2599
2600template<typename BV> template<class Opt>
2601void aggregator<BV>::pipeline<Opt>::complete()
2602{
2603 if (is_complete_)
2604 return;
2605
2606 if constexpr (Opt::is_make_results())
2607 {
2608 BM_ASSERT(!bv_res_vect_.size());
2609 size_t sz = arg_vect_.size();
2610 bv_res_vect_.resize(sz);
2611 bvector_type** bv_arr = bv_res_vect_.data();
2612 for (size_t i = 0; i < sz; ++i)
2613 bv_arr[i] = 0;
2614 }
2615 if constexpr (Opt::is_compute_counts())
2616 {
2617 size_t sz = arg_vect_.size();
2618 count_res_vect_.resize(sz);
2619 size_type* cnt_arr = count_res_vect_.data();
2620 ::memset(cnt_arr, 0, sz * sizeof(cnt_arr[0]));
2621 }
2622
2623 const arg_vector_type& pipe_args = get_args_vector();
2624 size_t pipe_size = pipe_args.size();
2625
2626 for (size_t p = 0; p < pipe_size; ++p)
2627 {
2628 arg_groups* ag = pipe_args[p];
2629 complete_arg_group(ag);
2630
2631 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_and = ag->arg_bv0.data();
2632 size_t src_and_size = ag->arg_bv0.size();
2633 unsigned top_blocks1 = max_top_blocks(bv_src_and, src_and_size);
2634 if (top_blocks1 > top_blocks_)
2635 top_blocks_ = top_blocks1;
2636
2637 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src_sub = ag->arg_bv1.data();
2638 size_t src_sub_size = ag->arg_bv1.size();
2639 unsigned top_blocks2 = max_top_blocks(bv_src_sub, src_sub_size);
2640 if (top_blocks2 > top_blocks_)
2641 top_blocks_ = top_blocks2;
2642
2643 } // for p
2644 is_complete_ = true;
2645
2646 BM_ASSERT(bcache_.bv_inp_vect_.size() == bcache_.cnt_vect_.size());
2647 BM_ASSERT(bcache_.bv_inp_vect_.size() == bcache_.blk_vect_.size());
2648 BM_ASSERT(bcache_.bv_inp_vect_.size() == bcache_.blk_ij_vect_.size());
2649}
2650
2651// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2652
2653template<typename BV> template<class Opt>
2654void aggregator<BV>::pipeline<Opt>::complete_arg_group(arg_groups* ag)
2655{
2656 BM_ASSERT(ag);
2657 auto sz = ag->arg_bv0.size();
2658 total_vect_ += sz;
2659 complete_arg_sub_group(ag->arg_idx0, ag->arg_bv0.data(), sz);
2660 sz = ag->arg_bv1.size();
2661 total_vect_ += sz;
2662 complete_arg_sub_group(ag->arg_idx1, ag->arg_bv1.data(), sz);
2663}
2664
2665// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2666
2667template<typename BV> template<class Opt>
2668void aggregator<BV>::pipeline<Opt>::complete_arg_sub_group(
2669 index_vector_type& idx_vect,
2670 const bvector_type_const_ptr* bv_src, size_t size)
2671{
2672 BM_ASSERT(idx_vect.size() == 0);
2673
2674 for (size_t k = 0; k < size; ++k)
2675 {
2676 bool found(false); size_t bv_idx(0);
2677 const bvector_type* bv = bv_src[k];
2678 if (bv)
2679 {
2680 const bvector_type** bv_arr = bcache_.bv_inp_vect_.data();
2681 found =
2682 bm::find_ptr((void**)bv_arr, bcache_.bv_inp_vect_.size(),
2683 bv, &bv_idx);
2684 }
2685 if (found)
2686 bcache_.cnt_vect_[bv_idx]++; // increment vector usage counter
2687 else // not found (new one!)
2688 {
2689 bv_idx = bcache_.bv_inp_vect_.size();
2690 bcache_.bv_inp_vect_.push_back(bv); // register a new bv (0-cnt)
2691 bcache_.cnt_vect_.push_back(0);
2692 bcache_.blk_vect_.push_back(0); // NULL ptr
2693 bcache_.blk_ij_vect_.push_back(bm::pair<unsigned, unsigned>(0u, 0u));
2694 }
2695 // each arg group
2696 idx_vect.push_back(bv_idx);
2697 } // for k
2698
2699 BM_ASSERT(idx_vect.size() == size);
2700}
2701
2702// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2703
2704template<typename BV> template<class Opt>
2705typename aggregator<BV>::arg_groups*
2706aggregator<BV>::pipeline<Opt>::add()
2707{
2708 BM_ASSERT(!is_complete_);
2709 arg_groups* arg = construct_arg_group();
2710 arg_vect_.push_back(arg);
2711 return arg;
2712}
2713
2714// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2715
2716template<typename BV> template<class Opt>
2717size_t aggregator<BV>::pipeline<Opt>::compute_run_batch() const BMNOEXCEPT
2718{
2719 const size_t cache_size = 256 * 1024; // estimation-speculation (L2)
2720 // ad-hoc estimate (not correct!) uses 2/3 of bit-vectors size (some are GAPs)
2721 // TODO: need to use real sparse vector statistics (AVG block size)
2722 //
2723 const float block_size = 0.75f * (bm::set_block_size * sizeof(bm::word_t));
2724 const float bv_struct_overhead = (64 * 8); // 8 cache lines in bytes
2725 const float cached_vect = float(cache_size) / float(block_size + bv_struct_overhead);
2726
2727 size_t bv_count = unique_vectors();
2728 size_t args_total = arg_vect_.size(); // number of arg groups
2729 if ((bv_count < cached_vect) || (args_total < 2)) // worst case fit in L2
2730 return args_total;
2731
2732 size_t avg_vect_per_group = total_vect_ / args_total;
2733
2734 const float reuse_coeff = 0.7f; // spec. coeff of resue of vectors
2735 float f_batch_size =
2736 (1+reuse_coeff)*(float(avg_vect_per_group) / float(cached_vect) + 0.99f);
2737 size_t batch_size = size_t(f_batch_size);
2738
2739 return batch_size;
2740}
2741
2742
2743// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2744// Arg Groups
2745// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
2746
2747template<typename BV>
2748size_t aggregator<BV>::arg_groups::add(const bvector_type* bv,
2749 unsigned agr_group)
2750{
2751 BM_ASSERT_THROW(agr_group <= 1, BM_ERR_RANGE);
2752 BM_ASSERT(agr_group <= 1);
2753 switch (agr_group)
2754 {
2755 case 0:
2756 if (!bv)
2757 return arg_bv0.size();
2758 arg_bv0.push_back(bv);
2759 return arg_bv0.size();
2760 case 1:
2761 if (!bv)
2762 return arg_bv1.size();
2763 arg_bv1.push_back(bv);
2764 return arg_bv1.size();
2765 default:
2766 BM_ASSERT(0);
2767 }
2768 return 0;
2769}
2770
2771// ------------------------------------------------------------------------

2774} // bm
